name: negnegi

body.origin:
|- wceq(cneg(cneg(c0)), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cneg(cneg(c0)), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cneg(cneg(c0)), c0)
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cneg(cneg(c0)), c0))

comment: A number is equal to the negative of its negative. Theorem I.4 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 8-Feb-1995.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
